title: Drawing, "Hygeia, after an Antique Statue in Giustiniani Collection, Rome", ca. 1820
medium: Pen and ink, brush and bistre wash over traces of graphite on laid paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Woman seated upon rock, raises her right hand with device. Coiling snake sits in her lap while her left hand holds its head.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Hygeia, after an Antique Statue in Giustiniani Collection, Rome", ca. 1820.
ca. 1820. Pen and ink, brush and bistre wash over traces of graphite on laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-1647.
